title: Adobe Creative Cloud Suite Guide: Logging into Adobe CCS with Okta SSO
content: This document provides a step-by-step guide for logging into Adobe Creative Cloud Suite using Okta and Single Sign-On (SSO) Upon completing these steps, you should be successfully signed into your Adobe CCS dashboard, granting you full access to the Adobe Creative Cloud Suite. Use the Okta icon in your Chrome toolbar for quick and easy access to ALL your apps! Click the puzzle piece then click the pin next to Okta Browser plugin.
